context:
Beads description:
Modern toggle/switch input component. Variations to consider: simple toggle, short/compact toggle, toggle with icons (check/x), toggle with label positioning (left/right). Should be accessible (proper checkbox semantics), support disabled state, and work with CSS custom properties for theming. Reference: Tailwind UI toggle patterns.
